summary: The story of 4 lives slammed together in a shocking moment. Intercutting between a carjacking and the separate stories of the 4 kids in Atlanta, we watch as they hurtle toward a life-changing end.
cast: Brittany Snow|Christian Serratos|David Oyelowo|Evan Ross|Hosea Chanchez|Anna Enger Ritch|Sylvia Jefferies|Sharon Conley|Markice Moore|Sope Aluko|Justin Martin|J. Matthew Davis|Jason Park|Pill|Birdie Rose Gilreath|Larry Alexander|Derrick Baines|Stephanie E. King|BreeAnna Marie|Michael Pendergrass
keywords: child with a gun|shooting a woman|woman in jeopardy|carjacking|atlanta georgia
title: 96 Minutes
